job_tasks.phrase: play a pivotal role in the design, development, and operation of digital products
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes traditional software engineering activities focused on building and running digital products, aligning with the definition of developing and integrating software.

job_tasks.phrase: part of the full product development process
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in the entire lifecycle of a product, which is a core aspect of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: understanding the problem, through designing the solution by quick prototyping, then delivering and running our services in production
job_tasks.justification: This sentence outlines a typical software development lifecycle, from problem definition and prototyping to delivery and production operations, fitting the Software Development & Integration category.

soft_skills.justification: This phrase implies a need to grasp the business context or user needs to define the problem space, which aligns with understanding business requirements.
Prototyping suggests an innovative approach to solution design and implies taking initiative in exploring solutions.
This phrase directly relates to the operational aspect of software, ensuring services are live and functional in a production environment.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses entirely on the design, development, delivery, and operation of digital products. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI tasks, or specific AI/ML technologies. The tasks described fall squarely under traditional software engineering.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its focus on general digital product development and operations, with no indication of AI/ML specializations. This makes the classification straightforward.
